cmp: 分 (to divide/minute/(a measure word)/(a unit of length = 0.33 centimeter), part)
mng: to disguise oneself as, to dress up, to play (a role), to put on (an expression)

exm.mng: to impersonate, to act the part of sb, to disguise oneself as sb else
to play the role of, to act
to decorate, to dress, to make up, to adorn, manner of dressing, style of dress
to dress up, to disguise oneself

exm.pyn: jué sè bàn yǎn yóu xì

exm.mng: dress in drag (male to female), man disguised as a woman
to dress up and make up (like an actor)
to dress up in disguise (idiom); to pretend for the purpose of deceit
